hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Sa'eed Al-Khudri said:"The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to stand in Zuhr and recite the equivalent of thirty verses in each Rak'ah, then in the first two Rak'ahs of 'Asr he would stand for the equivalent of fifteen verses

chapter.ara-name: باب عَدَدِ صَلاَةِ الْعَصْرِ فِي الْحَضَرِ .
chapter.eng-name: The Number Of Rak'ahs In Salat Al-'Asr While A Resident
